import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { addToCart, removeFromCart } from '../actions/cartActions' import { Card, ListGroup, Button, Col, Row, Image, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import MessageBox from '../components/MessageBox' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function PaymentProjectDescription(props) { const params = useParams() const { id: projectId } = params // const {search} = useLocation(); // const redirectInUrl = new URLSearchParams(search).get('redirect') // const redirect = redirectInUrl ? redirectInUrl: '/' const qty = props.location.search ? Number(props.location.search.split('=')[1]) : 1 const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => {}, []) const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { cartItems } = cart const removeFromCartHandler = (id) => { dispatch(removeFromCart(id)) } const checkoutHandler = () => { props.history.push('/signin?redirect=shipping') } return (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Cart is empty. Go shopping ) : ( {cartItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} ${item.price} dispatch( addToCart(item.product, Number(e.target.value)) ) } > {[...Array(item.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( ))} ))} )}

Subtotal ({cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty, 0)} items): $ {cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty * c.price, 0)}
